featured.text: Norwegians were prohibited from wearing any 38 of their national unity, such as buttons with the initials of their king.
The reason for doing this was simple: Paperclips were a Norwegian invention whose original function was to bind together.
The name most frequently 34 the paperclip invention is Johan Vaaler, a Norwegian inventor.

definition.zh_def: 挪威的；挪威人或挪威語的。
definition.en_def: Relating to Norway, its people, or its language.
definition.example: She is learning Norwegian to communicate with her relatives in Norway.
